package.name: nuxeo-birt-integration
package.title: Nuxeo - BIRT Integration (Reporting)
package.description: The Nuxeo - BIRT Integration offers integrated reporting capabilities on top of Nuxeo content management applications, enabling the design, rendering, and access of reports and analytics, through Eclipse BIRT. The BIRT Engine has been integrated in the Nuxeo platform, so that reporting capabilities are available without leaving the Nuxeo application, and security controls can be managed in one place.
